column5: He isn’t I asked him to tell me everything he didn’t tell me about how he felt about this for a while for not making me feel bad but I don’t want him to live with the guilt of this I’ve tired telling him it is what it is it happened nothing can change it I think that helped a little Bc that helps me a lot when this kinda of things happen but I want to make sure he knows for sure

I know that I am In therapy and he is working on going to therapy but I’m okay with him telling me everything he didn’t tell me for a while Bc he didn’t want to make me feel bad but I asked him to tell me everything so I asked for this and I’m okay with that I’m just not sure where to come at making sure he knows none of this is his fault
